specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Twill Weave > Denim Denim is designed to fade when washed, so be careful. Separate washing is recommended. Natural > Plant > Linen Linen fabric is made from natural materials, so it may have small bumps (slubs) in it. It is also important to keep linen fabric dry, because it can shrink or become misshapen if it gets wet. Store linen fabric in a cool, dry place where it can get plenty of air.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Jeans
